***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Alternative forms[edit] ****
    * पै (pai)
**** Etymology[edit] ****
Colloquial and regional variant of पर (par).[1] Inherited from Sauraseni
Prakrit 𑀧𑀭𑀺 (pari), 𑀉𑀧𑁆𑀧𑀭𑀺 (uppari), from Sanskrit उपरि (upari, “above”).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /peː/
Audio  (file)
**** Postposition[edit] ****
पे • (pe) (Urdu spelling پہ‎)
   1. on top of, on
   2. at
*** Synonyms[edit] ***
    * पर (par)
**** References[edit] ****
   1. ^_https://dsal.uchicago.edu/cgi-bin/app/

***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
From Proto-Sino-Tibetan *b-ləj.
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [pe]
**** Numeral[edit] ****
पे • (pe)
   1. four
